name: Invalid Cert Count
description: Invalid Certificate Count aggregates by IP any TLS alerts from the Suricata rule set. This only counts alerts pertaining to Invalid TLS with signature ids between 2230000 to 2230020

features.dest_total_invalid: Total of Invalid TLS alerts for this IP
features.dest_type_count: Count of this alert type for this IP
features.src_total_invalid: Total of Invalid TLS alerts for this IP
features.src_type_count: Count of this alert type for this IP
